flawed_nl_solution:
After one year it earns $10 in interest because 100 x 0.1 = <<100*0.1=10>>10
It has $120 in it after a year because 100 + 10 + 10 = <<100+10+10=120>>120
In the second year it earns $12 in interest because 120 x 0.1 = <<120*0.1=12>>12
In the second year it has $142 in it because 120 + 12 + 10 = <<120+12+10=137>>137

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 142.0, not 137.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
